scenario_1.persona_desc: A tech-savvy individual who is interested in using their iPhone as a modem. They are familiar with the concept of personal hotspots and tethering, and are looking for ways to extend their Internet connection beyond their smartphone. They may be a business owner or a digital nomad who travels frequently and needs to access the Internet on the go. They are tech-savvy and may have experience with smartphones and other devices.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is Right. Even though Person A gets more, I still receive $400, which is the same as in the Left option.
